showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ 1) shower #2 leaked. Very low water pressure, and what pressure there was it went out the top of the fixture! I mean what competent maintenance person can‚Äôt put on a shower head without it leaking! If you can‚Äôt do that watch‚Äôs YouTube video ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ I had a hot shower this morning in a clean bath. Good stuff. ‚Ä¶
The most expensive places I found 18$ a shower ‚Ä¶ shower not really clean or need to learn how clean it !! ‚Ä¶
Good place to stop for fuel, small parking lot.  shower not so warm. But the staff here is very friendly.
David McleanLocal Guide ¬∑ 836 reviews ¬∑ 963 photos
Got a hot shower , washed all my bedding . & truck gear .  No complaints. Nick was very helpful .

Employees are great and snacks are great but showers needs to be cleaner.  I pay $18 for a shower and it was disgusting. Hair everywhere and mold on walls. Talk to supervisor, show him pictures and he just apologized but dint offer a refund ‚Ä¶

If you like taking a Cold shower with Low water pressure that smells like feet? This is the place for you, Everything is overpriced, The menu in the restaurant keeps getting smaller and smaller, and they charge you an arm and a leg for it ü§® ‚Ä¶

The laundry room sucks cause their dryer went out to dry towels for shower room so they use the drivers laundry, no care in world  by management so they use two of the 4 dryers for their benefit so inconvient

‚Ä¶ now. The roller food is usually kept up but there have been times when I've found it empty. The bathrooms are well maintained and the shower, though smaller, stays hot and is also clean. Plus side is, they do have a good beer selection.

‚Ä¶ was very helpful.  So I‚Äôm a new driver I get there around 10pm, I‚Äôm only allowed to buy fuel from TA/Petro. All the parking was almost taken Mike reserved me a spot while I took a shower. He showed me how to use the points. I got a free ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText:
10 usd for shower 30 mins and plenty of parking.they accept cash or cards.
It has own room.If you are far from your home or city good place to rest and wait. Thanks for friendly and helpful employers.

Nice little place. Showered here and it was very clean
$10 is a great price for a shower or free with 50 gallons of diesel. I didnt use the other services, eatery at the end of the building or repair shop. Glad to find clean well run little truck stops
Small quiet parking lot, blindside for most spots. First 4 hours free, then it's $20 for overnight. They have showers, laundry and restaurants nearby.
David McleanLocal Guide ¬∑ 836 reviews ¬∑ 963 photos

Small truck stop, easy in and out. Has all the essentials you need. Even has amenities you need as a truck driver, shower, restroom, parking (paid) when closed has a portapotty in the back that was very clean as well as lighting so your not using in the dark. Great restaurant next door named reds kitchen and tavern.

Self service trailer washout is a much appreciated service, particularly with every truck wash in the area being closed Sundays! Drivers, sweep your trailers out best you can before you arrive, and be prepared to sweep up any debris you wash out

Nice and clean truck stop
Showers are clean ive used both of them during my stay in Peabody
. ‚Ä¶
Good for 50 gallons of diesel they give you a free shower and parking. If not you have to pay 10 for shower and 20 for parking overnight 4 hours free have restaurant

Wonderful place! The parking lot was well lit the showers were good the curtain could be changed but wasn‚Äôt anything that deterred me away. The water was super hot! The guy working this morning was extremely nice! We are from Indiana so we ‚Ä¶

Nice little truck stop. About 25-30 parking spots. Only 2 1/2 fuel islands. Get 50 gals. Of fuel get free parking and free shower. Without getting fuel get 4 free hours of parking then it's $20 for 24 hours. Washout on site from sunrise to sunset do it yourself.

showerReviews.reviewText: Clean place, clean shower, and clean laundryroom. ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ Clean restroom and showers. Shower cost you $10 but if any driver fuels 80 gallons fuel and doesn‚Äôt uses shower they give that shower ticket to you.
Not bad for a mom & pop truck stop. $10 clean showers. You need to show your CDL or your DOT medical card to buy a shower. Cleaner showers than most big name truck stops.

It used to be a good place but not now. They raised gasoline price, shower is restricted, washing/drying machines are old and worthless. Every time I come at night I meet two young boys on cashier table playing phones and no interest to ‚Ä¶

After finishing a stressful tour we were ready for some R&R. This stop was just what we needed! The shower was perfect and the staff was super kind. The general area has stores that provide access to anything you may need. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ of I-90. Paved parking, nice stuff, clean restrooms and building overall! Took a morning shower here today. A very nice guy didn‚Äôt charge me for a shower since somebody in front of me paid for a fuel but didn‚Äôt use a shower! WOW I was so ‚Ä¶

Box trucks and smaller trucks are not welcome. No shower. The shower is only for CDL drivers. Missing customers. I decide not to spend $ for my 60 gallon diesel. Keep doing this way your cashier will sit without the work.

For a smaller truck stop, I'm quite pleased. So many truck stops in the northeast charge an arm and a leg to park and even to take a shower. It only cost $10 for a shower when you show a CDL, decent amount of parking on both sides and ‚Ä¶

This truck plaza is amazing! From the super nice employees to the cleanest bathroom and showers I ever seen! The Dunkin is great!! The Latino gentlemen working Night Shift really stood out to me. He was super kind when I asked to purchase a ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ in a few rhing they dont get the deals BIG TRUCK STOPS get , mot their fault . Rememberyou'rein Massachusetts.  And they do have a lot of cool stuff üòé.  I definitely recommend stopping in . A lot of are drivers like to shower here too ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ so nice but not nice enough to stop here again! My husband and I have gone in a few times and they were extremely rude but this last time we went in was to take showers. First of all my husbands shower was disgusting the floor was ‚Ä¶
Nice little old timey truck stop. 50 Gallons for a free shower. Showers are old school. Nothing special, but if you're a hot mess, they get the job done. People here always seem pretty cool.
